page.title: 12LIVING IN PLUMSTEAD
page.content: I love living in Plumstead. It's a place where all the facilities you could ever dream of are just a bus ride away. I like going out on my bike, bombing down Griffin Rd or shooting across the common as fast as I can. I haven't much of a walk to school but I will when I go to secondary school. All my relatives live in this area so we keep in touch. *************************************** Living in Plumstead it's about the same every day. In the morning I get up at half past seven, get washed, get dressed. I start off to school at 5 to 8. I go to school 5 days a week. When I come home I turn the T.V. right on. I sit and look at the T.V. all night and I look at it when I'm eating my dinner. When I tell my dad the T.V.'s on the blink he says it's because I always have it on.
